version_description:
大變化，大家！
我們已經完美地融入iOS7 "剪贴并"更快，更直觀 ！這是我們最美麗的應用程序呢。

在這個 新版本有什麼：
- 一個完整的iOS 7的設計大修。這意味著你可以刷回去，搖到撤消 - 直觀的小 東西。
- 新的共享選項 - 包括 ​Airdrop， Instagram， Flickr，甚至印刷！哇！你現在可以打印你的短信！
- 一個美麗的微光效果，使拼接的圖像感覺就像你下面一個仙靈下來森林道路！
- 一個更優雅的安排頁面！
- 更容易管理的裁切線！
- 在每一頁上 更直觀的按鈕！
- 翻譯成簡化字！
- 更快的加載每個頁面！

我們希望你喜歡​ "剪贴并" 留下一個回顧​, ​讓我們知道你有多麼的愛我們!

注： ​"剪贴并"是由廣告支持的，但如果你先前支付了，您可以通過點擊設置菜單中移除廣告關閉廣告免費。
另外還要注意：​"剪贴并"在這個時候 不與iPad兼容。敬請期待......

- 如果您恢复购买时遇到任何问题，请通过邮件 stitchitapp@gmail.com 联系我们，这对我们非常重要。

- 漏洞修复

- Fix for bug with iPhone 6 Plus where users would see a line where each crop was.
- Fix for bug that caused images to be cropped incorrectly.
- Fix for bugs in the importer page.
- Optimizations to increase the number of images that can be Stitched at once.
- Other Bug fixes and optimizations.
- Hebrew, Hindi, and Arabic.

Big changes, everyone! In this update (which we hope you rate well on the App Store!), we've provided many improvements, including:

- A fix for a bug where some users weren't prompted for access to Photos
- A fix for a bug with iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus where users would see a line where each crop was.
- New languages! Arabic, Hebrew, Korean (עברית, العربية, 한국어), and Hindi!
- A fix for a bug that caused images to be cropped incorrectly.
- Fixes for bugs in the importer page.
- Stabilization optimizations to increase the number of images that can be Stitched at once.
- Other Bug fixes and optimizations.

If you like Stitch It!, please help us to increase our App Store visibility by providing a nice review for us on this update! We love you and appreciate your support!

- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- Fixes issue where users would loose their Pro Upgrade and be asked to buy it again (sorry!)
- Fixes issue that caused app to crash when stitching a lot of pictures
- Fixes issue that caused duplicated images appearing in the import page
- Lots of other fixes and improvements
- 修正了一个阻止某些用户恢复购买的错误。
- 修正了一个阻止某些用户恢复购买的错误。
- 修正了一个阻止某些用户恢复购买的错误。
